A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I LOVED this movie. Not only were the cinematography and character building fabulous\, but I feel that this is the natural direction the series - and the Jedi/Sith\, must take. Just as the original Star Wars (Episode IV) start with a young\, niave view of the world - everything is black or white\, one or the other - this explores the challenge of grey areas\, of the balance of dark and light in everyone\, and that we all have the force\, it is how we chose to use it. Can't wait for the next one!
